snippet: The international trade in conventional weapons that are fueling conflicts must be regulated by a global treaty.
abstract: Editorial welcomes the fact that the United Nations has begun negotiating a global treaty to regulate international trade in conventional arms; contends that it is absurd that conventional weapons are not subject to strong controls when trade in virtually every major commodity is subject to international agreements.
lead_paragraph: The international trade in conventional weapons that are fueling conflicts must be regulated by a global treaty.
